attributes.action: Nationalize Manchester United To Get Rid Of Malcum Glazer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Malcum Glazer Is An Awful Owner And He Needs To Go

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
